item.title: Meta Accused of Torrenting Porn to Advance Its Goal of AI ‘Superintelligence’
item.description: Strike 3 Holdings is suing Meta in federal court, alleging the tech giant pirated copyrighted adult videos to train its AI models.

item.title: Mastodon has a new plan to make money: Hosting and support services for the open social web
item.description: Mastodon launches hosting and support services to generate revenue and expand the open social web.

item.title: Indian fintech Jar turns profitable by enabling millions to save in gold
item.description: Jar has been profitable after tax for the past two quarters.
